content: As the new head of House Gloucester, Lorenz first worked to restore his own territory, and then expanded his vision to include reforms for all FÃ³dlan. At the height of his storied political career, he announced his marriage to Lysithea. Though the only daughter of the former Count Ordelia had already renounced all claim to nobility, the people happily accepted their union. She rarely appeared in public, due to health concerns, but it is said that a great many policies credited to Lorenz were actually her ideas.
